sentences.en: He had just arrived hotfoot from London.
I have an unnerving sensation that someone is giving me a hotfoot in my left shoe.
sentences.cn: 我有一种令人紧张的感觉,好像有人在我的左鞋里恶作剧.

sentences.en: I hotfooted it out of there as soon as possible.
The children come running hotfoot when they hear tea is ready.
sentences.cn: 孩子们听说茶点已准备好了,便赶紧跑过来.

sentences.en: The movie will begin in five minutes. we'd better hotfoot it to the theater.
sentences.cn: 电影还有五分钟就要开场了! 我们最好快一点去电影院!
